content: is the weather getting chilly and you need a quit knit to keep those hands cozy then these handwarmers are just the ticket the pattern includes instructions for knitting them in the round as well as flat so these will be an easy knit no matter your skill level and they are a perfect stash- or scrap-buster for using up leftover 8ply yarn plus with sizes ranging from kiddos to large adults you will be able to knit up pairs for the whole family so what are you waiting for go whip up some cozy handwarmers for yourself and your loved ones today **sizes ** child small adult adult large adult or to fit 14 16 18 20 cm measured around palm **yarn ** any 8ply / dk weight yarn we used woolly 8ply 104m/50g in 2 colours but you can use as many or as few colours as you like **quantity ** approximately 30 40 50 60 g total **needles ** 3 50mm and 4 00 needles if working in the round use 80cm circular needles **gauge ** 22 sts x 32 row to 10cm in stocking stitch note that *row* gauge is not crucial **materials ** 3 stitch markers stitch holder or waste yarn yarn needle for sewing in ends
